Method Detail

itemStateChanged

public void itemStateChanged(java.awt.event.ItemEvent e)
Registers ChesssquareButton clicks. It constructs a Move from a sequence of two subsequent ChesssquareButton clicks, where the first one is a click of a piece in the current position of the player whose turn it is. If the Move constitutes a legal move, it asks the associated GameController to execute it. If the move is illegal, it displays an error message.

Specified by:
itemStateChanged in interface GUIController
Specified by:
itemStateChanged in interface java.awt.event.ItemListener

e - The field click event
